alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:10PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Medina, southeastern Cuyahoga and northern Summit Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 210 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Warrensville Heights to near North Royalton to near Medina. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Cuyahoga Falls, North Royalton, Solon, Hudson, Twinsburg, Streetsboro, Warrensville Heights, Macedonia, South Russell, Highland Hills, Stow, Garfield Heights, Shaker Heights, Maple Heights, Broadview Heights, Aurora, Brecksville, Bedford and Beachwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
